#summary How to deactivate Javascript minifier for debugging purposes

= Introduction =

When testing a PowerTool (or any GUI Extension), if you get an Javascript error, it is difficult to point where it comes from because all the code comes minified.

Below you will find how to disable this behaviour. Thanks to Frank van Puffelen for this great tip.


= Details =

Edit yout System.config file, located in: $\Tridion\web\WebUI\WebRoot\Configuration

Modify the following node:
<code language="xml">
<filter for="Script" type="Tridion.Web.UI.Resources.Filters.JScriptMinifier, Tridion.Web.UI.Resources.Filters" enabled="always"></code>

to 

<code language="xml"><filter for="Script" type="Tridion.Web.UI.Resources.Filters.JScriptMinifier, Tridion.Web.UI.Resources.Filters" enabled="never"></code>
